roleset.name: depict as being more than is actual
roleset.note: OVERREPRESENT-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

example.name: overrepresent-v
example.text: Whether a selective sweep has occurred or not can be investigated by measuring linkage disequilibrium , or whether [a given haplotype]-1 is overrepresented *-1 in the population .

example.name: overrepresent-v
example.text: Television news programs and newspapers overrepresent racial minorities as crime suspects and whites as crime victims.‚Äù
